column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This food definitely took me back to my Barcelona days! These Tapas were phenomenal. Because I went with a large group (in my opinion
column2: the best way to go when dinning at a Tapas restaurant)
column3: I was able to try a number of things
column4: from seafood to beef to chicken to vegetables...the works! I think my favorite where the bacon wrapped dates
column5: the short cut of beef and mashed potatoes
column6: and the spinach and cheese stuffed mushrooms. They definitely know how to accommodate both meet eaters and vegetarians
column7: as I was with a mix of both.
